basics.name: TIMOTHY BAKER
basics.label: NETWORK ENGINEER | R&S
basics.summary: Network Engineer with 10 years of experience in Data/VOIP managed services, design, deployment, and support.  Hands on experience implementing and troubleshooting complex voice and data solutions.  Proven ability to work effectively in a team environment and meet deadlines consistently.

skills.name: Core Competencies
keywords:
· BGP, OSPF, EIGRP, HSRP, VRRP, GLBP, VTP, RSTP, MSTP
· EVC/Metro E, MPLS, T1/T3/DS3, MLPP
· L2LVPN, IP SLA, DMVPN, HA, IPSEC and SSL VPN
· PRI, CAAS, Digital Sip Trunking, SIP, SCCP

highlights: Provide 24x7 break/fix support for all core devices across the network
Configure and troubleshoot Core hardware: Cisco ASR1000, Nexus 7200 series routers. Cisco 4500, 3700 & 3500 series switches, Cisco 5510X & 5512X ASA's.

· Build core side NNI's, and CUGs.
· Test and Turn up carrier NNI's.
· Design and build core customer configurations.
· Managed core configurations using rancid among other Linux based tools.
· Track vrf associations to customer codes and manage all core and customer vrf's.
· Communicate use of S-tags and C-tags to distinguish customer data at the core and PE with carriers.
· Participated in team of 3 to create a private voice solution for VELO Cloud sd-wan in its infancy.  The solution for the Velo Cloud voice deployment resulted in a patent for the manufacturer.
· Lead all Enterprise nationwide SD-Wan conversions.
· Served as SME for all site to site VPN, and SD-Wan voice/data deployments.  
· Responsible for configuration of customer premises equipment and core network equipment for new and existing customers.
· Oversee turn up and testing of CPE with field technicians and provisioning team.
· Configure and troubleshoot the following hardware: Cisco ASR1000, 7200, 7600, 1900, 2900 & 3900 series routers.  Cisco Nexus 7000, 4500 3700, and 3500, Cisco SMB series, Brocade 6500 switches.  Cisco 5505, 5510 & 5512­X ASA's.  Adtran 900 series, Netvanta 3430/4430 routers and Adtran 1234 switches.
· Work directly with customer engineers to find individualized solutions for customers with advanced network requirements. This includes voice/data fail over, redundant hardware fail over and centralized firewall solutions.
· Create documentation and visuals for service delivery to provide customers.
· Test and finalize advanced CPE and core network templates for future deployments.
· Completed several nationwide MPLS conversions, some with as many as 5000+ locations.
· Implement and troubleshoot the following protocols/circuits/deployments: BGP, EIGRP, OSPF, IPSec, GRE, MST, RPVST, HSRP, VRRP, LLDP, CDP, DHCP, SIP, T1's, Metro Ethernet, MPLS, MLPPP, Ether-channels/Link-Aggregation, VLAN's, VRF's, & 802.1Q trunking.
· Act as main technical escalation point for voice and data provisioning group within Service Delivery.
· Responsible for adding new customers into Cacti monitoring system.
· Support one off installs for SIP Trunking for customer Asterisk PBX's, Cisco Call Manger and CUBE.
· Design and implement voice builds for customers on the Broadworks voice platform.
· Build Sip trunks for on-net and off-net (proxy) deployments.

· Provided support maintenance and installation of Cisco 5500 series ASAs, 2900, 1900, 800 series routers, and 3700, 3500, 2900 series switches.
· Completed test and turn up for sales offices and division offices including troubleshooting any issues with circuits.
· Deployed DMVPN for sales offices/communities to provide secure off-net WAN connectivity.
· Managed and configure Cisco RA VPN.
· Maintin and deployed Tacacs, and Radius for SSO using Windows domain credentials.
· Provisioned Cisco IP phones for sales and division offices using CCM.
· Cisco Unity and division IVR maintenance.
· Configured dial plans and call routing for new offices.
· Ownership of call center issues and maintenance of  Cisco UCCE.
· Distinguished voice and data traffic via QOS to remedy intermittent voice quality isssues.
· Transitioned all internal prefixes to EIGRP.
· Create Redhat and Centos VM's to manage WAN resources.
· Configure playbooks to automate deployment of task specific Vm's.
· Supported two offsite Datacenters and DR site.
· Participated with a team of three to virtualize 80 percent of the environment.

· Managed a team of four technicians
· Provided all network administration tasks and planned upgrades/patches coordinating team of techs and engineers to minimize downtime and impact on operations.
· Troubleshoot circuit issues at corporate and remote offices.
· Update and maintain Cisco IOS versions on all corporate routers, firewalls, and switches.
· Provided L2 segmentation of internal traffic using MSTP.
· Administer Windows Server 2008, 2003, Active Directory, and MS Exchange Server.
· Provisioning and maintenance of SAN volumes.
· Manage Citrix and VPN access for remote employees.
· Automated onboarding and termination of employees using Windows Powershell scripting.
· Monitored network performance, analyzed traffic, resolved internal network issues, and escalated provider side issues.
· Responsible for all Cisco UCCX issues to ensure call center service level.
· CUCM phone provisioning and Cisco Unity voicemail management.

· Assist LFOs with residential FTTN and FTTP turn ups.
· Troubleshoot signal attenuation and detect bridge taps to facilitate service.
· Build and troubleshoot residential VDSL circuits.
· Support LFO dispatch to CO to ensure proper line card configuration.
· Terminate optical nodes for service.

work.position: SBC DSL Support/Dell XPS Tier 2 Supervisor
highlights:
·  Senior manager in a team of ten responsible for 100 support agents.
· Provided technical warranty support for Dell XPS customers.
· Trained a team of managers to replicate the project in the Phillipines for Dell.
· Supported SBC DSL customers with residential internet issues.
· Served as SME for SBC DSL home networking issues.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
